revised_title: The Effect of Thermal Agitation on Atomic Arrangement in Alloys - III
tldr: This article discusses the effect of thermal agitation on atomic arrangement in alloys and presents a detailed calculation of the equilibrium equations for a general case. The authors compare the dependence of entropy on superlattice order and explore the relation between the free energy of the alloy and the quantities in previous treatments of the problem. They also review the assumptions involved in existing calculations and discuss possible modifications.
